scripts.build-core: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/core.json shared/core,shared/semantic --expandTypography=true && npm run clean && style-dictionary build
scripts.build-theme-light: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/theme-light.json shared/core,shared/semantic,theme/light/semantic,theme/light/component --expandTypography=true && npm run clean && style-dictionary build -c config.theme.js
scripts.build-theme-dark: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/theme-dark.json shared/core,shared/semantic,theme/dark/semantic,theme/dark/component --expandTypography=true && npm run clean && style-dictionary build -c config.theme.js
